name: Snooker Rack
description: Keep your cue holstered and prepare to test your problem solving skills through the medium of snooker and engage with the game like never before. In this easy to play yet challenging snooker based puzzle game, use the points values of the snooker balls provided to match each section of the triangle rack to the target set. Win in the quickest possible time and then play again to lower the time and raise the standard. With two difficulty settings and a best time for each setting, learn the game and then take on the full challenge.
